sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T5.ID, T5.GROUP_NO, T5.PMT_STATUS, T5.APP_TYPE, T5.SUBMIT_DT, T5.COU FROM (SELECT T4.GROUP_NO, T4.APP_TYPE, T4.SUBMIT_DT, T4.PMT_STATUS,T4.ID,T6.cou,T2.ID as corrid,T1.APPLICATION_NO,T1.STATUS,T3.HCI_CODE,T3.HCI_NAME, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS address FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT application.APPLICATION_NO) COU, APP_GRP_ID FROM application GROUP BY app_grp_id) as T6 ON T4.ID = T6.app_grp_id JOIN taskView T7 ON T7.ref_No = T2.ID WHERE 1 = 1 and T1.STATUS != 'APST009' AND T1.STATUS != 'APST045' and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if dashUserId??> and T7.user_id = :dashUserId </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.role_id = :dashRoleId </#if> ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T5.ID, T5.APP_PREM_ID, T5.APPLICATION_NO, T5.SERVICE_ID, T5.STATUS, T5.HCI_CODE, T5.TASK_ID FROM (SELECT T1.ID APPLICATION_ID,T1.APPLICATION_NO,T1.SERVICE_ID, T1.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID LICENCE_ID, T1.STATUS,T1.VERSION, T3.HCI_CODE,T2.ID,T4.GROUP_NO,T1.APP_TYPE,T3.HCI_NAME,T4.SUBMIT_DT, T3.BLK_NO, T3.FLOOR_NO, T3.UNIT_NO, T3.STREET_NAME, T3.BUILDING_NAME, T3.POSTAL_CODE, T3.ID as APP_PREM_ID, T7.ID AS TASK_ID, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS address FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID JOIN taskView T7 ON T7.ref_No = T2.ID WHERE 1 = 1 and T1.STATUS != 'APST009' AND T1.STATUS != 'APST045' <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T4.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if dashUserId??> and T7.user_id = :dashUserId </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.role_id = :dashRoleId </#if> ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: Dashboard Search Common Pool Task By Application Group

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T5.ID, T5.GROUP_NO, T5.PMT_STATUS, T5.APP_TYPE, T5.SUBMIT_DT, T5.COU FROM (SELECT T4.ID, T4.GROUP_NO, T4.PMT_STATUS, T1.ID AS APP_PREM_CORRID, T2.APPLICATION_NO, T4.APP_TYPE, T2.STATUS, T3.HCI_CODE, T3.HCI_NAME, T4.SUBMIT_DT, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS PREMISE, T6.COU FROM APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T1 JOIN APPLICATION T2 ON T2.ID = T1.APPLICATION_ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T1.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T2.APP_GRP_ID JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT application.APPLICATION_NO) COU, APP_GRP_ID FROM application GROUP BY app_grp_id) as T6 ON T4.ID = T6.app_grp_id JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T1.ID WHERE 1 = 1 and T2.STATUS != 'APST009' AND T2.STATUS != 'APST045' <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId </#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') and T7.USER_ID is NULL ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: get Application By App Group in Common Pool

sqls.sql: SELECT T5.ID, MAX(T5.APP_PREM_ID) AS APP_PREM_ID, MAX(T7.ID) AS TASK_ID, MAX(T5.APPLICATION_NO) AS APPLICATION_NO, MAX(T5.SERVICE_ID) AS SERVICE_ID, MAX(T5.STATUS) AS STATUS, MAX(T5.HCI_CODE) AS HCI_CODE FROM ( SELECT T2.ID, T3.ID as APP_PREM_ID, T1.APPLICATION_NO, T1.SERVICE_ID, T1.STATUS, T3.HCI_NAME, T3.HCI_CODE, T4.GROUP_NO, T1.APP_TYPE, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO, case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS address FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 and T1.STATUS != 'APST009' AND T1.STATUS != 'APST045' <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> ) T5 JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T5.ID and T7.USER_ID is NULL WHERE 1 = 1 and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T5.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> GROUP BY T5.ID

sql.remarks: Dashboard Search Kpi Task By Application Group

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T1.ID, T1.GROUP_NO, T1.PMT_STATUS, T1.APP_TYPE, T1.SUBMIT_DT, T1.COU FROM APP_GRP_EXCEEDING_DAY_VIEW T1 JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T1.CORREID WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId </#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.user_id = :dashUserId </#if> and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T1.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T1.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T1.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T1.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: get Application By App Group in Kpi Pool

sqls.sql: SELECT T1.ID, MAX(T1.APP_PREM_ID) AS APP_PREM_ID, MAX(T7.ID) AS TASK_ID, MAX(T1.APPLICATION_NO) AS APPLICATION_NO, MAX(T1.SERVICE_ID) AS SERVICE_ID, MAX(T1.STATUS) AS STATUS, MAX(T1.HCI_CODE) AS HCI_CODE FROM APP_EXCEEDING_DAY_VIEW T1 JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T1.ID and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T1.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T1.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.user_id = :dashUserId </#if> <#if application_type??> and T1.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T1.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T1.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> GROUP BY T1.ID

sql.remarks: Dashboard Search Wait Approve Task By Application Group

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T7.ID, T7.GROUP_NO, T7.PMT_STATUS, T7.APP_TYPE, T7.SUBMIT_DT, T7.COU FROM TASK_WAITING_APPROVAL_APP_GRP_VIEW T7 LEFT JOIN TASKVIEW T1 ON T1.REF_NO = T7.CORRID and T1.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.ACTION_BY = :dashUserId </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T7.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T7.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T7.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T7.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: get Application By App Group in Wait Approve Pool

sqls.sql: SELECT T7.ID, MAX(T7.APP_PREM_ID) AS APP_PREM_ID, MAX(T1.ID) AS TASK_ID, MAX(T7.APPLICATION_NO) AS APPLICATION_NO, MAX(T7.SERVICE_ID) AS SERVICE_ID, MAX(T7.STATUS) AS STATUS, MAX(T7.HCI_CODE) AS HCI_CODE FROM TASK_WAITING_APPROVAL_APP_VIEW T7 LEFT JOIN TASKVIEW T1 ON T1.REF_NO = T7.ID and T1.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T7.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T7.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.ACTION_BY = :dashUserId </#if> <#if application_type??> and T7.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T7.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T7.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> GROUP BY T7.ID

sql.remarks: Dashboard Search Applicant's Reply By Application Group

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T7.ID, T7.GROUP_NO, T7.PMT_STATUS, T7.APP_TYPE, T7.SUBMIT_DT, T7.COU FROM TASK_WAITING_APPLICANT_REPLY_GRP_VIEW T7 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.ACTION_BY = :dashUserId </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T7.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T7.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and T7.STATUS = :application_status</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T7.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T7.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: get Application By App Group in Applicant's Reply Pool

sqls.sql: SELECT T7.ID, MAX(T7.APP_PREM_ID) AS APP_PREM_ID, MAX(T1.ID) AS TASK_ID, MAX(T7.APPLICATION_NO) AS APPLICATION_NO, MAX(T7.SERVICE_ID) AS SERVICE_ID, MAX(T7.STATUS) AS STATUS, MAX(T7.HCI_CODE) AS HCI_CODE FROM TASK_WAITING_APPLICANT_REPLY_APP_VIEW T7 LEFT JOIN TASKVIEW T1 ON T1.REF_NO = T7.ID and T1.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T7.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T7.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.ACTION_BY = :dashUserId </#if> <#if application_type??> and T7.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and T7.STATUS = :application_status</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T7.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T7.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> GROUP BY T7.ID

sql.remarks: Dashboard Search Near Renewal Licence Expire Day

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T1.ID, T1.GROUP_NO, T1.PMT_STATUS, T1.APP_TYPE, T1.SUBMIT_DT, T1.COU FROM TASK_RENEWAL_EXPIRY_GRP_VIEW T1 LEFT JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T1.CORRID and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId </#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.user_id = :dashUserId </#if> <#if lic_renew_exp??> and T1.licExpDays <= :lic_renew_exp</#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T1.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T1.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T1.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T1.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: get Application By Near Renewal Licence Expire Day

sqls.sql: SELECT T1.ID, MAX(T1.APP_PREM_ID) AS APP_PREM_ID, MAX(T7.ID) AS TASK_ID, MAX(T1.APPLICATION_NO) AS APPLICATION_NO, MAX(T1.SERVICE_ID) AS SERVICE_ID, MAX(T1.STATUS) AS STATUS, MAX(T1.HCI_CODE) AS HCI_CODE FROM TASK_RENEWAL_EXPIRY_APP_VIEW T1 LEFT JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T1.ID and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T1.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T1.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId</#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T7.user_id = :dashUserId </#if> <#if lic_renew_exp??> and T1.LICEXPDAYS <= :lic_renew_exp</#if> <#if application_type??> and T1.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T1.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T1.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> GROUP BY T1.ID

sql.remarks: Dashboard Search Supervisor Task By Application Group

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT T5.ID, T5.GROUP_NO, T5.PMT_STATUS, T5.APP_TYPE, T5.SUBMIT_DT, T5.COU FROM (SELECT T4.ID, T4.GROUP_NO, T4.PMT_STATUS, T1.ID AS APP_PREM_CORRID, T2.APPLICATION_NO, T4.APP_TYPE, T2.STATUS, T3.HCI_CODE, T3.HCI_NAME, T4.SUBMIT_DT, T7.USER_ID, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS PREMISE, T6.COU FROM APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T1 JOIN APPLICATION T2 ON T2.ID = T1.APPLICATION_ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T1.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T2.APP_GRP_ID JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT application.APPLICATION_NO) COU, APP_GRP_ID FROM application GROUP BY app_grp_id) as T6 ON T4.ID = T6.app_grp_id JOIN TASKVIEW T7 ON T7.REF_NO = T1.ID WHERE 1 = 1 <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.ROLE_ID = :dashRoleId </#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T4.ID = :dashUserId </#if> and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appGroup_list??> and ${appGroup_list} </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if dashCommonPoolStatus??> and T5.USER_ID is NULL</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: get Application By App Group in Supervisor Pool

sqls.sql: SELECT T5.ID, MAX(T5.APP_PREM_ID) AS APP_PREM_ID, MAX(T5.TASK_ID) AS TASK_ID, MAX(T5.APPLICATION_NO) AS APPLICATION_NO, MAX(T5.SERVICE_ID) AS SERVICE_ID, MAX(T5.STATUS) AS STATUS, MAX(T5.HCI_CODE) AS HCI_CODE FROM (SELECT T1.ID APPLICATION_ID,T1.APPLICATION_NO,T1.SERVICE_ID, T1.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID LICENCE_ID, T1.STATUS, T3.HCI_CODE, T2.ID, T4.GROUP_NO, T1.APP_TYPE, T3.HCI_NAME, T4.SUBMIT_DT, T3.ID as APP_PREM_ID, T7.ID AS TASK_ID, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS address FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID JOIN taskView T7 ON T7.ref_No = T2.ID WHERE 1 = 1 and T1.STATUS != 'APST009' AND T1.STATUS != 'APST045' <#if appCorrId_list??> and ${appCorrId_list} </#if> <#if workGroup_list??> and ${workGroup_list} </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T4.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> and T7.TASK_STATUS in ('TSTATUS001','TSTATUS002') <#if dashCommonPoolStatus??> and T7.USER_ID is NULL</#if> <#if dashUserId??> and T4.ID = :dashUserId </#if> <#if dashRoleId??> and T7.role_id = :dashRoleId </#if> <#if dashRoleIdList??> and ${dashRoleIdList} </#if> ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if appPremId_list??> and ${appPremId_list} </#if> <#if dashFilterAppNo??> and charindex(:dashFilterAppNo, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if hci_address??> and charindex(:hci_address, T5.address) >0 </#if> GROUP BY T5.ID

sql.remarks: System admin dashboard Over all Search

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT viewApp.ID, viewApp.wrk_grp_id, viewApp.SVC_CODE ,viewApp.STATUS ,viewApp.SERVICE_ID ,viewApp.APP_TYPE , viewApp.APPLICATION_ID ,viewApp.APPLICATION_NO ,viewApp.KPI ,viewApp.RMD_THRESHOLD ,viewApp.ROLE_ID , viewApp.SLA_DAYS ,viewApp.STAGE_ID ,viewApp.SUB_STAGE ,viewApp.ACTION_BY ,viewApp.act_time FROM DASHBOARD_ALL_ACTIVE_APPLICATIONS_VIEW viewApp WHERE 1 = 1 <#if applicationNo??> and charindex(:applicationNo, viewApp.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_types??> and ${application_types}</#if> <#if svc_codes??> and ${svc_codes}</#if> <#if user_id??> and viewApp.ACTION_BY= :user_id</#if> <#if stage_id??> and (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(36), viewApp.STAGE_ID) = :stage_id or CONVERT(NVARCHAR(36), viewApp.SUB_STAGE) = :stage_id)</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT viewApp.APP_GRP_ID as ID, viewApp.wrk_grp_id, viewApp.GROUP_NO ,viewApp.PMT_STATUS ,viewApp.cou ,viewApp.APP_TYPE , viewApp.ROLE_ID ,viewApp.STAGE_ID ,viewApp.SUB_STAGE ,viewApp.UPDATED_DT ,viewApp.SUBMIT_DT, viewApp.ACTION_BY FROM DASHBOARD_ALL_GRP_APPLICATIONS_VIEW viewApp WHERE 1 = 1 <#if applicationNo??> and charindex(:applicationNo, viewApp.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_types??> and ${application_types}</#if> <#if svc_codes??> and ${svc_codes}</#if> <#if role_id??> and viewApp.ROLE_ID= :role_id</#if> <#if action_by??> and viewApp.ACTION_BY= :action_by</#if> <#if stage_id??> and (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(36), viewApp.STAGE_ID) = :stage_id or CONVERT(NVARCHAR(36), viewApp.SUB_STAGE) = :stage_id)</#if>

sql.remarks: System admin dashboard Detail Drop Search

sqls.sql: SELECT DISTINCT viewApp.ID, viewApp.wrk_grp_id, viewApp.SVC_CODE, viewApp.STATUS, viewApp.SERVICE_ID, viewApp.APP_TYPE, viewApp.APPLICATION_ID, viewApp.APPLICATION_NO, isnull (viewApp.KPI,0) as KPI, isnull (viewApp.RMD_THRESHOLD,0) as RMD_THRESHOLD, viewApp.ROLE_ID, isnull (viewApp.SLA_DAYS,0) as SLA_DAYS, viewApp.STAGE_ID, viewApp.SUB_STAGE, viewApp.ACTION_BY, viewApp.act_time, isnull (viewApp.total_sla_days,0) as total_sla_days, viewApp.APP_GRP_ID FROM DASHBOARD_APPLICATIONS_DETAILS_VIEW viewApp WHERE 1 = 1 <#if applicationNo??> and charindex(:applicationNo, viewApp.APPLICATION_NO) >0 </#if> <#if application_types??> and ${application_types}</#if> <#if groupId??> and viewApp.APP_GRP_ID = :groupId</#if> <#if svc_codes??> and ${svc_codes}</#if> <#if role_id??> and viewApp.ROLE_ID= :role_id</#if> <#if action_by??> and viewApp.ACTION_BY= :action_by</#if> <#if app_grp_id??> and viewApp.APP_GRP_ID= :app_grp_id</#if> <#if stage_id??> and (CONVERT(NVARCHAR(36), viewApp.STAGE_ID) = :stage_id or CONVERT(NVARCHAR(36), viewApp.SUB_STAGE) = :stage_id)</#if>
